entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the morning then rising. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 late in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
